snippet: Spotted by police while allegedly driving erratically, he failed field sobriety tests and was arrested for driving while intoxicated and possessing controlled substances.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Indianapolis Colts owner Jim Irsay may face felony charges after being arrested when stopped for driving erratically; failed field sobriety test and multiple prescription drugs were found inside his vehicle; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: Spotted by police while allegedly driving erratically, he failed field sobriety tests and was arrested for driving while intoxicated and possessing controlled substances.

headline.main: After Traffic Stop, Colts’ Owner May Face Felony Drug Charges
headline.print_headline: After Traffic Stop, Colts’ Owner May Face Felony Drug Charges
